body:
you can put both like

/usr/local/go/bin:/var/go/bin

2015-07-29 23:54 GMT-04:00 dbaroncelli <notifications@github.com>:

> @hyangah <https://github.com/hyangah> I found the reason why it was not
> working!!!
>
> I was setting PATH to my GOPATH/bin, which is where the binary gomobile
> gets copied when you get the gomobile package:
> go get golang.org/x/mobile/cmd/gomobile
>
> I didn't realize PATH was meant to be the directory where both the
> gomobile and go need to be
>
> Actually, this can be quite confusing, because by default gomobile and go
> are in two different locations:
> gomobile goes to GOPATH/bin
> go goes to GOROOT/bin
>
> I solved by setting the build.gradle PATH to my GOROOT/bin (which is the
> default /usr/local/go/bin) and copying gomobile to there
>
